actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution relating to restricting transmission of sports contests by cable television.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Communications Commission to refrain from publishing regulations restricting the transmission of sports contests by professional sports organization's via cable television until such time as the Congress of the United States shall have completed its proposed review of Public Law 93-107.

titles.title: Resolution relating to restricting transmission of sports contests by cable television.
